how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
putting it all together, what value does: incredibly fast access to notes and tips about the work and my self - written guides
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...)
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki with custom saver (e.g. TiddlyPWA, Timimi, tw5-browser-nativesaver);Multi-file wiki served through Node.js
how do you back up/sync changes between: No automatic sync across my devices
we would love to know what your basic se: mostly I access the nodejs wiki in the intranet of the office but manually keep updated an HTML snapshot offline to access when out of the office
outside of plugins, palettes and other i: mostly some macros to have multiple page templates
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: despite the changes the workflow remains the same, very clean and intuitive
what could we do better? prompts for thi: I would like a better markdown support without using more than one plugins to have code highlight, a side panel with the titles and subtitle index and so on
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
